paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant N588K, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: short QT syndrome with conduction abnormalities
individual_records.evidence_sentence: hiPSC-derived cardiac cell sheets (hiPSC-CCSs) were generated from a symptomatic SQTS patient carrying the N588K mutation in the KCNH2 gene.

functional_data.summary: The N588K variant was associated with conduction abnormalities and arrhythmogenesis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the affected individual.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was specifically linked to short QT syndrome and demonstrated significant functional effects in vitro.
key_quotes: hiPSC-derived cardiac cell sheets (hiPSC-CCSs) were generated from a symptomatic SQTS patient carrying the N588K mutation in the KCNH2 gene.
Optical mapping reported shortened APD, impaired APD-rate adaptation, abbreviated wavelength of excitation, and increased inducibility of sustained spiral waves.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned with sufficient details.
